text: Charlotte Mary Hawkins (born 16 May 1975) is a British television and radio presenter, newsreader and journalist. ==Works== Hawkins joined ITV's Meridian Tonight in 2003, presenting the main news program. She left in 2006 to present the breakfast show Sky News Sunrise with Eamonn Holmes. In 2014, she left Sky News to co-host the ITV breakfast show Good Morning Britain. She also hosts a Sunday afternoon show on Classic FM. She participated in the fifteenth series of Strictly Come Dancing. But she was eliminated in the fourth week. title: Charlotte Hawkins
